p: The antimicrobial properties of the P-EO and HAp-P were assessed using both reference and clinical microbial strains from the Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Biology, University of Bucharest. The tested microbial strains were Gram-negative bacteria ( E. coli ATCC 25922, E. coli C5 (carbapenemase producer strain), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853, P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027) Gram-positive bacteria ( S. aureus ATCC 25923, S. aureus ATCC 6538, E. faecium DSM 13590), and fungi ( C. parapsilosis ATCC 22019).
